title: ðŸš¨Washington to retire longtime franchise name & logo - Emergency Podcast (Football 7/13)
description:
The 'Redskins' are no more. On Monday, the organization announced that after 87 years, they have retired their name and logo. Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson offer their immediate reactions to theÂ news that had been rumored over the weekend. They discuss what finally prompted the change from Washington owner Daniel Snyder as well as what's next for the franchise with a new name and design.Â Which new name option do you like the best?
